name: Design Research
description: Validates that a unique, subject-derived visual identity has been researched and documented

all_of.description: Subject-derived design research report with color palette, typography, animation philosophy

validations.description: Design research should cover Color, Typography, and Animation (warning if missing)

notes: G4 validates that the design researcher produced a unique visual identity derived from the subject matter. The heading check uses loose term matching (not exact headings) because agents use varied heading formats: '## Color System', '## Proposed Color Palette', '## Typography Selection', etc. The term check is a warning, not a hard fail.
